column4: Does Ubuntu support PCI Sata adapters ?  there are like no pata hdd left on the market
I am currently running a server with a sata drive and a desktop with two sata drives and a pata drive all on linux..no problems here
well I was thinking about sata drives connected *through* a PCI card to the motherboard
as long as the sata controller on the card is supported by linux...i'd assume it would be since that's at the hardware/bios level
